metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3675 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Shim allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsread) via a crafted DHCPv6 packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3675` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

shim - 0.8-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shim package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8-0ubuntu2').
